item.title: Dear Daily Telegraph, I am writing to emphasize the importance of the UK choosing to participate in the European Arrest Warrant (EAW).
item.description:
Steve Peers This letter, penned by Steve Peers, was featured in prominent publications such as the Daily Telegraph, The Guardian, and BBC News. It urges support for the UK’s continued participation in the European Arrest Warrant (EAW) framework. Interested parties are invited to add their names to the list of signatories. An Open Letter to Parliament As Parliament prepares to vote on the UK’s involvement in certain EU measures, the European Arrest Warrant (EAW) stands out as a critical point of discussion...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/dear-daily-telegraph-i-am-writing-to-emphasize-the-importance-of-the-uk-choosing-to-participate-in-the-european-arrest-warrant-eaw/
